snippet: Ms. Abeysekera ran the Inform Human Rights Documentation Center, bringing attention to the violence in Sri Lanka as well as to women’s rights issues throughout South Asia.
abstract: Sunila Abeysekera, prominent human rights advocate who sought to bring the world’s attention to myriad acts of violence in Sri Lanka, despite threats against her own life that had forced her to live overseas, dies at age 61.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Abeysekera ran the Inform Human Rights Documentation Center, bringing attention to the violence in Sri Lanka as well as to women’s rights issues throughout South Asia.

headline.main: Sunila Abeysekera, Sri Lankan Human Rights Activist, Dies at 61
headline.print_headline: Sunila Abeysekera, 61, Sri Lankan Human Rights Activist

keywords.value: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
keywords.name: subject
